verses.roman:
prabhu nā khāile, keha nā kare bhojana
svarupa-gosāñi tabe kaila nivedana

synonyms: prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nā khāile—without eating; keha—anyone; nā—not; kare bhojana—accepts the prasāda; svarūpa-gosāñi—Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī; tabe—at that time; kaila nivedana—submitted.
translation: However, the devotees could not accept the prasāda until Caitanya Mahāprabhu took it. It was Svarūpa Gosvāmī who informed the Lord of this.
